statements: SELECT equipment_id, timestamp, sensor_data, maintenance_required FROM predictive_maintenance_models;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_id, timestamp FROM predictive_maintenance_models ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_id, sensor_data FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(equipment_id) AS avg_equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM predictive_maintenance_models;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE equipment_id = 123 AND maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM predictive_maintenance_models GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT sensor_data, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE GROUP BY sensor_data HAVING data_count > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_maintenance_date FROM predictive_maintenance_models GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT AVG(timestamp) AS avg_timestamp FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_cost FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM predictive_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM equipment_energy_usage GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_cost FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM equipment_energy_usage GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500;

SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance pm JOIN equipment_energy_usage eu ON pm.equipment_id = eu.equipment_id WHERE pm.maintenance_cost < 500 AND eu.energy_consumed < 100 ORDER BY pm.maintenance_cost ASC, eu.energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT pm.equipment_id, pm.equipment_name, eu.energy_consumed FROM predictive_maintenance pm LEFT JOIN equipment_energy_usage eu ON pm.equipment_id = eu.equipment_id WHERE eu.energy_consumed IS NULL OR eu.energy_consumed = 0 ORDER BY pm.equipment_id ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment_data;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT equipment_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, equipment_name, installation_date, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name='John' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date, maintenance_cost FROM equipment_data WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY installation_date ASC;

SELECT consum.consumption_id, equip.equipment_name, consum.timestamp, consum.energy_usage FROM equipment_data AS equip INNER JOIN energy_consumption AS consum ON equip.id = consum.equipment_id ORDER BY consum.timestamp DESC;

SELECT equip.equipment_name, COUNT(logs.log_id) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM equipment_data AS equip LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs AS logs ON equip.id = logs.equipment_id GROUP BY equip.equipment_name HAVING COUNT(logs.log_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_maintenance_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE equipment_id = 1001;
SELECT equipment_id, consumption_date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_type, model_accuracy FROM PredictiveModels WHERE deployment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL;

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM Equipment LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id GROUP BY Equipment.equipment_id, Equipment.equipment_name ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_id, Equipment.equipment_name, EnergyConsumption.energy_consumed, EnergyConsumption.power_consumed FROM Equipment INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Equipment.equipment_id = EnergyConsumption.equipment_id WHERE EnergyConsumption.consumption_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(maintenance_history) AS maintenance_entries FROM Equipment WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(maintenance_history) > 0 ORDER BY maintenance_entries DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT model_name, description, accuracy FROM MachineLearningModels WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number, installation_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_description FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.sensor_type, s.timestamp, s.reading FROM SensorData s JOIN Equipment e ON s.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE s.reading > 50;
SELECT m.model_name, m.description, m.accuracy FROM MachineLearningModels m ORDER BY m.accuracy DESC LIMIT 3;
